a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Incidence of child labor in the United States, 1890 to 1930
Labor force participation rate for children (ages 10-13) in the United States. These series are available for individual
and combined gender populations, and for urban and rural demographics.
Source: Long, C. D. (1958) The labor force under changing income and employment.
